text:
William pulled a copy of the Times at Ron, "you can have an appointment at any time, we are here to-"

"Fourteen miles I carried you, sir!" #TheTruth

passages.fragment: William pulled a copy of the Times
passages.full_quote: <used>William pulled a copy of the Times</used> out of his pocket

passages.full_quote: "Well, now," said Gunilla, waving the <used>copy of the Times at Ron, "you can</used> tell them that if they can sell these to people for twenty pence each, I'll let you keep one nice shiny penny."

passages.full_quote: "Look," said the demon patien<used>tly, "you can have an appointment at any time, r</used>ight"

passages.full_quote: "But, while your rosy face is a welcome sight <used>at any time, we are here to-" "Fourteen miles I carried you, sir</used>!"
